Functions
NumericalDifferentiation
float NumericalDifferentiation(
float x,
ObjectiveFunction objFunc
)

Computes the 1st derivative of a function via the symmetric difference quotient.

Parameters
x
float

value to compute derivative at

objFunc
ObjectiveFunction

underlying function being evaluated

Solves for the root of a function using Newton's method

Parameters
initialGuess
float

ObjectiveFunction
